desc.p: A token helper for regular C style integers.
This helper applies if the initial char is a decimal char.
desc.pre: Grammar. The number part can be preceded by (case doesnt matter) "0x" for hexidecimal, meaning the integer is in hex if not preceded, then the number is in decimal the number part is just Integer the number is followed by 0 or more flags (case doesnt matter) "U" for unsigned "L" for long "LL" for long long
